column1: Little Goat Diner////This was a random pick of places while visiting Chicago.  Yelp sort FTW.  We went for brunch
column2: lots of good stuff to pick from.  The service was good
column4: quick.  I ordered the Bullseye French Toast
column5: Husband ordered the Apple pancakes and hash browns.  This was enough food for 4!!  So filling
column6: and a great start to a busy day of walking in the cold!  The food was tasty!  When we visit Chicago again
column7: we will stop back in here
